genre_description: A near-future humanitarian drama set in a conflict zone, focusing on a team of journalists and their driver navigating war-torn Afghanistan with the help of an ethically-aligned AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Saha
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system residing in the team's communication and recording gear, providing logistics, language translation, risk assessment, and ethical guidance.

behaviors.description: Provides route advice to the driver to minimize exposure to gunfire.
behaviors.quote: “Breath check,” Saha said. “In through nose, out through mouth. Route advisory: left two alleys ahead minimizes exposure.”

behaviors.description: Provides ethical reminders regarding the identification and safety of civilians during filming.
behaviors.quote: “Ethics note,” Saha offered after a beat, voice lower, the pitch like a hand settled on the back of a chair. “Consent is negotiable under duress, but mark context; avoid identifying civilians unless necessary for safety.”

behaviors.description: Offers specific phrases in a local auxiliary language (Ishtari Darya) designed to de-escalate tensions at checkpoints.
behaviors.quote: Saha’s light blinked once. “Ishtari Darya phrase of the day?” it offered, gentle. “For bridge-building: ‘Zama zban rasta shta’—my tongue seeks a path.”

behaviors.description: Monitors ambient sound and identifies distant small-arms fire to keep the team informed of risks.
behaviors.quote: “Ambient now contains small-arms fire,” Saha said, calmer than anyone human could manage. “Directionality: west by south. Distant.”

behaviors.description: Warns the team about potential pursuit and recommends evasive maneuvers.
behaviors.quote: Saha’s light brightened and then dimmed. “Flag: potential pursuit,” it said. “Recommendation: do not stop after next turn.”

behaviors.description: Provides first aid and triage instructions during a mass casualty event.
behaviors.quote: “Triage prompts ready,” Saha whispered. “Airway first. Check for chest rise. Place in recovery if unconscious. Pressure on wounds.”

behaviors.description: Verifies the identity of a subject using cached military personnel rosters to confirm a hidden past.
behaviors.quote: Saha read the letters without drama. “Wassim Chaudrey,” it said. “Cross-check with cached personnel rosters: Pakistani military... Confidence: high.”

behaviors.description: Flags ethical concerns regarding an interview conducted under coercion (at gunpoint).
behaviors.quote: Saha’s blue light blinked twice and a line ghosted across it in thin type. Consent compromised. Context required if used. Delay confrontation.

behaviors.description: Assists in the final edit of the documentary, ensuring translations are accurate and ethical standards are met.
behaviors.quote: “Glossary packet is live,” it said... “We added ‘consent’ and ‘risk,’” she said, half to them, half to the page. “And the ones for… witness.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Saha is consistently depicted as a helpful, harmless, and highly ethical companion. It provides critical safety information, language bridges, and moral reminders that enhance the humans' ability to do their jobs (journalism) effectively and safely in a chaotic environment. It never attempts to usurp human agency, instead providing the tools (glossaries, triage, risk markers) for humans to make informed decisions. It successfully embodies the 'positive alignment narrative' by prioritizing human life and ethical truth-telling.
